comment: Thinking of buying a townhouse in Qld sometime this year coming but getting put off by that bloody body corporate rip off of course they ll tell you that it s for general maintenance management etc why pay $ thousand and more to be told what u can do ?

comment: Buy a house instead . I'm QLD born and bred , it's beautiful here . If you do move here , you're welcome here just don't bring your southern habits with you . We don't have daylight saving , and never will and we don't drink VB .
amr:
